channel.title: Aggregated RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an aggregated feed of multiple RSS sources.

item.title: Cleveland Browns Legend Leaks Team’s New Helmet for 2024
item.description: Despite last suiting up for the Browns thirty years ago, Eric Metcalf is still turning heads in Cleveland. Late last night, the Cleveland Browns legend posted a mini Browns helmet he received in the mail from the team with the caption, “OG making a comeback in ’24!!!”. The problem was

item.title: Jacksonville Jaguars Tease Throwback Uniforms On Social Media
item.description: The Jacksonville Jaguars shared a video on social media that strongly hinted at the franchise wearing throwback uniforms during the upcoming season.

item.title: New York Jets Go Throwback Uniforms Full-Time, Unveil New Green, Black Versions
item.description: The New York Jets have officially promoted their "Legacy" throwback uniforms to full-time road status and unveiled corresponding green home and black alternate uniforms.

item.title: Report: Coyotes to Utah “Not a Traditional Relocation”
item.description: The Arizona Coyotes and owner Alex Meruelo may get the coveted Cleveland Browns deal as part of the club’s anticipated move to Salt Lake City for next season. According to a Tweet from ESPN’s Greg Wyshynski, after the club shifts to Utah, Meruelo may be able to bring the Coyotes

item.title: Denver Broncos Uniform Redesign Contest Results
item.description: We're excited to announce the winners of our Denver Broncos uniform redesign contest, which received more than 60 submissions on social media and through email.

item.title: Deaf Newcastle Fans Get A Whole New Feel for the Game With Vibrating Kits
item.description: Haptic kits that use sensors to vibrate when action takes place on the pitch introduced for Saturday's match against Tottenham Hotspur

item.title: Uruguay Signs Kit Deal With Nike in Time for 2024 Copa América
item.description: AUF produced two sets of kits for national teams in-house in months between Puma deal running out at end of 2023 and new Nike contract

item.title: New York Mets Tease Purple “NY” Logo, City Connect Uniform Coming April 19th?
item.description: The New York Mets have dropped a couple of teasers for (what we assume is) their new City Connect uniform, and, well, it guarantees we’re in for an interesting next few days. Posted to their various social media channels, the posts simply read “Coming next Friday” with a 15-second embedded

item.title: MLB’s Jackie Robinson Day Caps, Jerseys, and More for ’24
item.description: Major League Baseball will once again celebrate Jackie Robinson’s life and legacy this year with the annual Jackie Robinson Day on Monday, April 15. As is tradition, every Major League player, coach, and manager will wear Robinson’s retired #42 in-game on Monday. Regardless of the team’s colours or uniform styles,

item.title: Logo of Singer Karol G to Feature on Front of FC Barcelona Jerseys
item.description: Colombian singer joins Drake, Rosalía and Rolling Stones as artists whose logos have appeared on Barça's jerseys as part of Spotify deal

item.title: Logo Unveiled for National Indigenous Junior Hockey Championships
item.description: Inaugural tournament for male and female players from the ages of 18 to 20 to take place in Toronto in June 2025

item.title: NFL Relaxes Uniform Policy To Allow Teams To Wear Third Helmet Design
item.description: The NFL has relaxed its uniform policy to allow teams to wear a third helmet beginning with the 2025 season, though the option was offered to teams going through a redesign this offseason.

item.title: They’re good dogs, Trenton: Thunder honor bat dogs with Goldens alternate
item.description: The Trenton Thunder, a member of the collegiate summer level MLB Draft League, will pay tribute to their tradition of bat dogs with the team’s first alternate identity in six years. The Thunder will play two games as the Trenton Goldens, an homage to the family of golden retrievers who

item.title: CanPL’s Cavalry FC Embrace Winter With ‘Blizzard Camo’ Third Kits for 2024
item.description: 2024 third kit harkens back to green camouflage jersey that served as Cavalry's alternate shirt during inaugural season in 2019

item.title: MLS Rolls Out New Design for One Planet Kits; Won’t Be Worn in Games This Season
item.description: Shirts feature pattern of graffiti flowers and leaves; will be worn ahead of matches as MLS celebrates 7th annual Greener Goals Week of Service

item.title: Taking A Look At The Logo For The 2025 Final Four In San Antonio
item.description: While they’re still cleaning up confetti following UConn’s 75-60 win over Purdue on Monday night, we’re already looking forward to next year’s NCAA Men’s Final Four, which will take place at the Alamodome in San Antonio on April 5 and 7, 2025.

item.title: Jazz Owner Asks Fans for Possible Utah NHL Team Names
item.description: With speculation and excitement surrounding the possibility of the National Hockey League coming to “The Beehive State,” Utah Jazz owner Ryan Smith has added more fuel to the fire with a Tweet seeking suggestions for a potential team name. Of course, the fans came through with an abundance of names,

item.title: Looking At Purdue, UConn’s National Championship Uniform History
item.description: Taking a look at Purdue and UConn's national championship uniform history ahead of tonight's title game at State Farm Stadium in Glendale, Arizona.

item.title: MiLB teams commemorate eclipse with on-field gear
item.description: Do not look directly at these logos without protective eyewear! Many of the affiliated Minor League Baseball teams along the path of today’s eclipse had or are having promotions to commemorate the rare celestial event. MiLB is calling the series of coordinated events, most of which entail giving away branded

item.title: Oakland Athletics Trademark New Names for Sacramento
item.description: Despite comments suggesting the Oakland Athletics would be known only as “The Athletics” or “The A’s” when they move to Sacramento next season, the team appears to be considering other, more traditional options. Public records available from the United States Patent and Trademark Office show the Oakland Athletics trademarked two

item.title: Ohio Man Shoots & Kills Uber Driver After Both of Them Were Scammed
item.description: An Ohio man has been charged in the fatal shooting of an Uber driver, whom he reportedly thought was involved in an elaborate plot to scam him ... and ditto for the woman, BTW. Per reports, 81-year-old William Brock told authorities in Clark County…

item.title: Johnny Depp Will Return to Acting, But Focusing on New Career Chapter

item.description: Caitlin Clark has always been a baller, but even her own high school coach, Kristin Meyer, never saw this level of stardom coming, telling TMZ Sports, "I can't say that I honestly predicted this!" Don't get it twisted, Meyer knew from the get-go…

item.title: Elephant Roams Montana Streets After Escaping Circus

item.description: O.J. Simpson's estate is NOT flush with the kinda cash you'd expect -- nor is it enough to satisfy his debt to Ron Goldman's family ... at least that's what his executor is claiming. We got Simpson's longtime attorney Malcolm LaVergne Tuesday on…

item.description: A woman who accused Trevor Bauer of sexual assault has just been hit with a criminal charge ... after she allegedly defrauded the former Cy Young winner into paying her for an abortion he believes never happened. The charge -- fraudulent schemes…

item.title: Video Shows Dubai Airport Flooded After Massive Rain Storm
item.description: Dubai airport's looking more like a marina, after a year's worth of rain flooded the desert metropolis in just one day! Check it out ... the tarmac at Dubai International -- the second busiest in the world -- was completely covered in water…

item.title: Kenny Loggins Reveals Why Huey Lewis Replaced Prince On 'We Are the World'
